sub_title: MD PhD, Cardiologist at the Leiden University Medical Center, Associate Editor of the European Heart Journal and Chair of the Education Committee of EACVI
summary: I am a cardiologist specialized in non-invasive cardiovascular imaging and directly involved in guiding percutaneous procedures for structural heart disease. Furthermore, I coordinate a translational research project on valvular heart disease studying the mechanisms behind mitral regurgitation and aortic stenosis. I have a PhD in 3D-echocardiography and cardiac magnetic resonance imaging and I am currently supervising several PhD students focussing on the clinical applications of imaging in valvular and structural heart diseases and on the genetic and molecular basis of organic valvular heart disease. I am an Associate Editor of the European Heart Journal. Furthermore, I am a Board Member of the European Association of Cardiovascular Imaging (EACVI) and the Chair of the Education Committee of EACVI.
